text:
Must-read: free 80-page prompt engineering guide.

Here's what you'll find inside:

→ The entire vocabulary necessary for prompting
→ Overview of different prompting techniques
→ Prompting frameworks you should know
→ How to go beyond English text prompts 
→ Methods for evaluating GenAI outputs
→ Working with different media types
→ Detailed real-world case study

To access the PDF, go to: https://lnkd.in/eWRNMC6r.

I also wrote a blog on "How to prompt" and it's my most read on Substack (100,000+ people read it). 

To access it (free), go to: https://lnkd.in/d7gBvDmK.
